mapper.insert: insert into food (food_name, description, category, price, image, is_like, is_available) values (#{foodName}, #{description}, #{category}, #{price}, #{image}, #{isLike}, #{isAvailable})
mapper.update: update food set food_name = #{foodName}, description = #{description}, category = #{category}, price = #{price}, image = #{image}, is_like = #{isLike}, is_available = #{isAvailable}, food_id = #{foodId} where food_id = #{foodId}
update food set is_available = 1 where food_id = #{id}
update food set is_available = 0 where food_id = #{id}
update food set is_like = 1 where food_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from food where true and #{min} <= price and price <= #{max} order by price desc
select * from food where food_name like concat('%', #{query}, '%')
select * from food natural join ( select food_id, sum(num_food) as sales from food_order group by food_id) as food_order_num order by sales desc limit 3
